p.s: The movie The Hate U Give directed by George Tillmann Jr. realesedreleased in 2018 deals with racism of the eyes of a black teenage girl.
This sequence is about Starr, the black teenage girl and her boyfriend Chris talking about their relationship.
In the opening scene we as the audience can see how Chris enters the school hallway and greets his friends.
Starr looks at him and thinks about/describes his lips.
As she notices his shoes which are Space Jam 11s Starr herself says is her weakness Chris notices her and walks towards him she turns her head around.
Chris then is behind her and takes his headphones so Starr can wear them to listen to his selfmade beats.
She turns around and tells Chris that she doesn't like the beat.
When Chris tells her that they need to talk about her being busy all the time and him wanting to meet her family when she responds with that they are busy too.
So Chris askes her again how she thinks the beat is and Starr mumbels with it is alright and okay.
Chris then says that he needs to test if the beat is good or not so he starts playing it without plugged to the headphones so everybody can hear it and starts dancing.
Which Starr thinks is a black behavior.
She grabs him by his arm and they go to a place where less people are.
